description: This source file defines a LightningJS component called 'NoteEditor' which provides a user interface for editing notes, including title and content fields, and handles saving and state management.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component for editing notes with UI elements such as title, content, and save button, along with internal state management and data fetching.

methods.name: $queueAutoSave
methods.description: Schedules an auto-save of the note content after a delay of 600ms, preventing frequent saves during rapid typing.

methods.name: $save
methods.description: Saves the current note's title and content by calling updateNote, with optional immediate save behavior when explicitly triggered.
